short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters movies and shows on IMDb. Exclude countries and genres to your heart's content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super lightweight extension (no storage, no permissions needed beside basic, fully private) that allows you to filter movies and shows on IMDb's website. Exclude countries and genres to your heart's content.

You can exclude certain Genres (e.g. Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Horror, History, and so on). 

You can also exclude certain countries/cinemas (Tired of Indian movies or K-dramas? Filter them out! 

Or, just interested in those genres, filter everything else out!) 


Sources used to make this: TMDB API
